adProperty.name: output-title
adProperty.description: Reference for module fj-doc-freemarker, type handler FreeMarkerHtmlTypeHandler

adElement.name: doc
adElement.description: This is the root element of source doc (consisting in a 'metadata' and a 'body' section)

adElement.name: metadata
adElement.description: Contains the meta informations of the document (roughly comparable to a HTML 'head' element)

adElement.name: meta
adElement.description: Contains the meta informations of the document ('meta' is kept for compatibility, better use 'metadata')

adElement.name: body
adElement.description: The body of the document (roughly comparable to a HTML 'body' element)

adElement.name: info
adElement.description: This is a key/value element containing informations for document generations

adAttribute.name: name
adAttribute.description: Contains the value of this information

adElement.name: header
adElement.description: A header made of a complex elements (not includes tables)

adAttribute.name: align
adAttribute.description: Header horizontal alignment

adAttribute.name: numbered
adAttribute.description: 'true' is the header should add page number

adAttribute.name: border-width
adAttribute.description: The size of the border

adAttribute.name: expected-size
adAttribute.description: Expected header size

adElement.name: footer
adElement.description: A footer made of simple elements (not includes tables)

adAttribute.name: align
adAttribute.description: Footer horizontal alignment

adAttribute.name: numbered
adAttribute.description: 'true' is the footer should add page number

adAttribute.name: border-width
adAttribute.description: The size of the border

adAttribute.name: expected-size
adAttribute.description: Expected footer size

adElement.name: header-ext
adElement.description: A header made of a complex elements (includes tables)

adAttribute.name: align
adAttribute.description: Header horizontal alignment

adAttribute.name: numbered
adAttribute.description: 'true' is the header should add page number

adAttribute.name: border-width
adAttribute.description: The size of the border

adAttribute.name: expected-size
adAttribute.description: Expected header size

adElement.name: footer-ext
adElement.description: A footer made of complex elements (includes tables)

adAttribute.name: align
adAttribute.description: Footer horizontal alignment

adAttribute.name: numbered
adAttribute.description: 'true' is the footer should add page number

adAttribute.name: border-width
adAttribute.description: The size of the border

adAttribute.name: expected-size
adAttribute.description: Expected footer size

adElement.name: background
adElement.description: A background image to use for the document

adElement.name: bookmark-tree
adElement.description: The root of the bookmark tree for the document

adElement.name: bookmark
adElement.description: A bookmark for the document

adAttribute.name: ref
adAttribute.description: The reference to the element id to link

adElement.name: para
adElement.description: A document paragraph (roughly comparable to a HTML 'p' element)

adAttribute.name: id
adAttribute.description: An element id (should be unique in the document)

adAttribute.name: style
adAttribute.description: Font style of the element

adAttribute.name: align
adAttribute.description: Horizontal alignment of the element

adAttribute.name: font-name
adAttribute.description: The name of the font to use

adAttribute.name: leading
adAttribute.description: The leading between lines

adAttribute.name: back-color
adAttribute.description: A color representation in HTML RGB format

adAttribute.name: fore-color
adAttribute.description: A color representation in HTML RGB format

adAttribute.name: type
adAttribute.description: Data type contained in the element

adAttribute.name: format
adAttribute.description: Data format

adAttribute.name: size
adAttribute.description: The size of the font to use

adAttribute.name: text-indent
adAttribute.description: Text indentation (currently ignored)

adAttribute.name: space-before
adAttribute.description: The spacing of the element (possibly in a given direction)

adAttribute.name: space-after
adAttribute.description: The spacing of the element (possibly in a given direction)

adAttribute.name: space-left
adAttribute.description: The spacing of the element (possibly in a given direction)

adAttribute.name: space-right
adAttribute.description: The spacing of the element (possibly in a given direction)

adAttribute.name: white-space-collapse
adAttribute.description: Value is 'true' if the white spaces must be trimmed

adElement.name: table
adElement.description: A document table (roughly comparable to a HTML 'table' element)

adAttribute.name: id
adAttribute.description: An element id (should be unique in the document)

adAttribute.name: columns
adAttribute.description: Number of columns in a table

adAttribute.name: width
adAttribute.description: The width in percentage of the table

adAttribute.name: back-color
adAttribute.description: A color representation in HTML RGB format

adAttribute.name: fore-color
adAttribute.description: A color representation in HTML RGB format

adAttribute.name: spacing
adAttribute.description: The spacing of the element (possibly in a given direction)

adAttribute.name: padding
adAttribute.description: The spacing of the element (possibly in a given direction)

adAttribute.name: colwidths
adAttribute.description: The sizes of the columns of the table as percentages separated by semicolons (for instance '30;30;40' are three columns if size 30%, 30% and 40%)

adAttribute.name: space-before
adAttribute.description: The spacing of the element (possibly in a given direction)

adAttribute.name: space-after
adAttribute.description: The spacing of the element (possibly in a given direction)

adAttribute.name: render-mode
adAttribute.description: Table render mode (if 'inline' the handler will try to render the table as a flow of element)

adElement.name: row
adElement.description: A table row (roughly comparable to a HTML 'tr' element)

adAttribute.name: id
adAttribute.description: An element id (should be unique in the document)

adAttribute.name: header
adAttribute.description: Set to 'true' if the row is a header for the table

adElement.name: cell
adElement.description: A row cell (roughly comparable to a HTML 'th' or 'td' element)

adAttribute.name: id
adAttribute.description: An element id (should be unique in the document)

adAttribute.name: colspan
adAttribute.description: The column span size of the cell (default value is '1')

adAttribute.name: rowspan
adAttribute.description: The row span size of the cell (default value is '1')

adAttribute.name: align
adAttribute.description: Horizontal alignment of the element

adAttribute.name: valign
adAttribute.description: Vertical alignment of the element

adAttribute.name: header
adAttribute.description: Set to 'true' if the cell is a header for the table

adAttribute.name: border-color
adAttribute.description: A color representation in HTML RGB format

adAttribute.name: border-color-top
adAttribute.description: A color representation in HTML RGB format

adAttribute.name: border-color-bottom
adAttribute.description: A color representation in HTML RGB format

adAttribute.name: border-color-left
adAttribute.description: A color representation in HTML RGB format

adAttribute.name: border-color-right
adAttribute.description: A color representation in HTML RGB format

adAttribute.name: border-width
adAttribute.description: The size of the border

adAttribute.name: border-width-top
adAttribute.description: The size of the border

adAttribute.name: border-width-bottom
adAttribute.description: The size of the border

adAttribute.name: border-width-left
adAttribute.description: The size of the border

adAttribute.name: border-width-right
adAttribute.description: The size of the border

adAttribute.name: back-color
adAttribute.description: A color representation in HTML RGB format

adAttribute.name: fore-color
adAttribute.description: A color representation in HTML RGB format

adAttribute.name: type
adAttribute.description: Data type contained in the element

adElement.name: list
adElement.description: A list in the document (roughly comparable to a HTML 'ul' pr 'ol' element)

adAttribute.name: id
adAttribute.description: An element id (should be unique in the document)

adAttribute.name: list-type
adAttribute.description: The type fo the list ( 'uld' - unordered with dots, 'ulm' - unordered with mius, 'oln' - ordered with numbers, 'uld' - ordered with letters )

adElement.name: li
adElement.description: A item of a list (roughly comparable to a HTML 'li' element)

adAttribute.name: id
adAttribute.description: An element id (should be unique in the document)

adElement.name: pl
adElement.description: A phrase list contained in a list item

adElement.name: image
adElement.description: An image to include in the document (roughly comparable to a HTML 'image' element)

adAttribute.name: url
adAttribute.description: Valid values are : cl://pathinjar (Path inside the class loader, safest way to load the image) http://imageurl (but generating machine should be able to access the url) file://imagepath (Path should be absolute, but you can use, for instance, free marker templating to make it more generic.) In case of base64 just provide the type (png,jpg etc.)

adAttribute.name: type
adAttribute.description: The type of the image

adAttribute.name: scaling
adAttribute.description: The scaling percentage (can be higher than 100)

adAttribute.name: base64
adAttribute.description: Base 64 representation of a resource

adAttribute.name: alt
adAttribute.description: Alternate description of the element

adAttribute.name: align
adAttribute.description: Horizontal alignment of the element

adElement.name: phrase
adElement.description: A phrase of the document (roughly comparable to a HTML 'span' element)

adAttribute.name: id
adAttribute.description: An element id (should be unique in the document)

adAttribute.name: font-name
adAttribute.description: The name of the font to use

adAttribute.name: style
adAttribute.description: Font style of the element

adAttribute.name: leading
adAttribute.description: The leading between lines

adAttribute.name: size
adAttribute.description: The size of the font to use

adAttribute.name: white-space-collapse
adAttribute.description: Value is 'true' if the white spaces must be trimmed

adElement.name: nbsp
adElement.description: Simple spacing (roughly comparable to a HTML 'nbsp' entity)

adAttribute.name: length
adAttribute.description: The length of the spacing

adElement.name: br
adElement.description: A line break (roughly comparable to a HTML 'br' element)

adElement.name: barcode
adElement.description: Create a barcode (this element is kept for compatibility, but it's better to generate barcode as images)

adAttribute.name: size
adAttribute.description: The size of the font to use

adAttribute.name: text
adAttribute.description: Alternate description of the element

adElement.name: h
adElement.description: A document heading (roughly comparable to a HTML 'h1', 'h2' etc. element)

adAttribute.name: id
adAttribute.description: An element id (should be unique in the document)

adAttribute.name: style
adAttribute.description: Font style of the element

adAttribute.name: align
adAttribute.description: Horizontal alignment of the element

adAttribute.name: font-name
adAttribute.description: The name of the font to use

adAttribute.name: leading
adAttribute.description: The leading between lines

adAttribute.name: back-color
adAttribute.description: A color representation in HTML RGB format

adAttribute.name: fore-color
adAttribute.description: A color representation in HTML RGB format

adAttribute.name: type
adAttribute.description: Data type contained in the element

adAttribute.name: format
adAttribute.description: Data format

adAttribute.name: size
adAttribute.description: The size of the font to use

adAttribute.name: text-indent
adAttribute.description: Text indentation (currently ignored)

adAttribute.name: space-before
adAttribute.description: The spacing of the element (possibly in a given direction)

adAttribute.name: space-after
adAttribute.description: The spacing of the element (possibly in a given direction)

adAttribute.name: space-left
adAttribute.description: The spacing of the element (possibly in a given direction)

adAttribute.name: space-right
adAttribute.description: The spacing of the element (possibly in a given direction)

adAttribute.name: white-space-collapse
adAttribute.description: Value is 'true' if the white spaces must be trimmed

adAttribute.name: head-level
adAttribute.description: The level of the headings, from 1 (most relevant) to 7 (less relevant) (roughly comparable to a HTML 'h1', 'h2' etc.)

adElement.name: page-break
adElement.description: A page break heading
